description:
-Solve 45 unique puzzles with kids having fun
-Record your progress and come back later
-Start with any level!
-Try to reach 3 stars in every puzzle
-Beautiful art for the whole family
-Boy knights, girl astronauts, kids riding dragons and more!
name: Jigsaw Kids 1
intro: Solve 45 beautiful puzzles of kids going on incredible adventures like walking on the moon, flying spaceships or riding dragons!
